entry.title: Please trim excessive quoting
entry.summary: When sending messages to a certain list, it is important to note that those over 40Kbytes in size require moderation approval before they can be posted. To ensure that messages are posted promptly, it is recommended to trim excessive quoting before hitting send. This information was conveyed by Gavin Andresen, the sender of the message. It is important to follow these guidelines to avoid delays in posting messages on the list.
